option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: ANDROID_NDK=$(locate ndk-build | grep -m 1 '/ndk-build$' | sed 's/\/ndk-build$//') && if [ -z "$ANDROID_NDK" ]; then echo "Android NDK not found. Please ensure it is installed and indexed by locate."; exit 1; fi && echo "ANDROID_NDK is set to: $ANDROID_NDK" && export ANDROID_NDK && CMAKE_PATH='$USER_HOME$/Android/Sdk/cmake/3.18.1/bin/cmake' && mkdir -p build && cd build && $CMAKE_PATH -DANDROID_NDK=$ANDROID_NDK ../src/main/cpp/CMakeLists.txt && $CMAKE_PATH --build ../src/main/cpp && adb push intermediates/merged_native_libs/debug/out/lib/arm64-v8a/libteamcode.so /data/local/tmp
